categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Navik was a male Human who was a major in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, when he was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock.

Major Navik appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Belsavis Equipment Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock, though he was later relabeled as the Level 42 Equipment Vendor. He was later removed from the game along with the rest of the planetary Equipment Commendations vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
